form

System

HTML Structure
<span class="form textfield"><input class="form-elem" type="text"></span>
<!--form-unit이 있을경우-->
<span class="form textfield">
	<input class="form-elem" type="text">
	<span class="form-func">
		<span class="form-unit"></span>
		<span class="form-time"></span>
	</span>
</span>
<!-- //form-unit -->

HTML Structure
<span class="form quantity">
	<input class="form-elem" type="text" title="수량" pattern=[0-9]*" inputmode="numeric" value="1" >
	<button class="form-step-up" type="button" tabindex="-1">증가</button>
	<button class="form-step-down" type="button" tabindex="-1" disabled="disabled">감소</button>
</span>

</label>
<label class="form radio module-a style-c large-2x">
	<input class="form-elem" type="radio" checked="checked"><span class ="form-text">라디오 버튼"</span>
</label>
